plays.text: Penalty to Chris Neil 2 minutes for Crosschecking Paul Ranheim
Goal scored by Dan McGillis assisted by Eric Desjardins and Adam Oates
Penalty to Ruslan Fedotenko 2 minutes for Boarding Daniel Alfredsson
Goal scored by Daniel Alfredsson assisted by Radek Bonk and Marian Hossa
Penalty to John LeClair 2 minutes for High Sticking Daniel Alfredsson
Penalty to Sami Salo 2 minutes for Holding Justin Williams
Penalty to Justin Williams 2 minutes for High Sticking Shane Hnidy
Penalty to Keith Primeau 2 minutes for Crosschecking Mike Fisher
Goal scored by Martin Havlat assisted by Marian Hossa and Radek Bonk
